divs: sighting detailsas the (rectangular) object went from south to north i recall the proportions as being similar to a cell phone. the surface "radiated" and was a pinkish-orange with "waves" or "ripples" moving from my left-to-right which was from its longer dimention\sides. the narrow front\rear was the part going forward from south to north. i was so spellbound and busy trying to figure out what i was seeing that i didn't follow it any further than when it was directly over me (although slightly to the left\east). i seemed not to care where it went; just, what the bleep is\was that. moments after, i went inside and reported "it" to my wife. to this day, she says that she's never seen "that look" on my face when i came into the house. that's not like me. also what's not like me is to not have gotten up of my chair and called my wife to witness all "this".
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Lindsay
There were no other sightings in Lindsay on or around September 10th 2013
Summary: object slowly "glided" about the speed I'd seen hot ait baloons; initially, what caught my eye was what I thought was the "burn" of a hot air ballon - it was that colour when first seen toward horizon over property to the south.
